page.title: 08POLITICS
page.content: The Lanark area is very interesting to a student of {Politics}because of the strange mixture of the political make up of the town. At a national level the town is represented by Dame Judith Hart ,who holds the constituency for the {Labour Party},whereas at a local level the town is represented by two { {Independants},who are inclined towards the {Conservative Party}. At a local level however no one party holds overall control as the other parts of Clydesdale District have returned other types of candidate.The results of the next general election could be interesting as Dame Judith Hart is retiring.Maybe the S.D.P.Alliance might make some headway due to the results obtained in the last election.Apart from the Labour and Conservative parties the Liberals and the Scottish Nationalists are active.
